body:
"We need a mature tag separate from the milf tag"
YES, fucking yes don't know why hentai sites never distinguish between the two. Now since she has a granddaughter, it is technically assumed that she's a milf, however, milf are usually between late 20's and early 50's (at best, of course, there may be outliers here and there), while mature is supposed to be after menopause or some years before, there is a lot of nuance to this subject. I guess that considering the vast amounts of hentai works that gets uploaded regularly, most site admins figure that having one more tag for what most simpletons would perceive as it being the same thing is not worth having around. I think that those enthusiastic enough on this subject wouldn't find it a problem to add one more tag if the content contains it.
We need a mature tag separate from the milf tag
Still Hot...That's just me, I dont about y'all.
